TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Bloodrage
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the rage generated by your Bloodrage ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shield Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by [@value]% and has a [@value2]% chance to generate [@value3] rage when a block occurs.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Thunder Clap
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap ability by [@value2] rage point and increases the damage by [@value]% and the slowing effect by an additional [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Incite
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike, Thunder Clap and Cleave abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Anticipation
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to dodge by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Last Stand
TalentsTiers.Description: When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum health for 20 sec. After the effect expires, the health is lost.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Revenge
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases damage of your Revenge ability [@value]% and causes your Revenge to strike an additional target for [@value2]% damage.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shield Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your block value by [@value]% and reduces the cooldown of your Shield Block ability by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Toughness
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your armor value from items by [@value]% and  and reduces the duration of all movement slowing effects by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Spell Reflection
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the chance you'll be hit by spells by [@value]% and when the ability is used it will reflect the first spell cast against the [@value2] closest party members within 20 yards.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Disarm
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Disarm ability by [@value] sec and causes the target to take an additional [@value2]% damage while disarmed.

TalentsTiers.Name: Puncture
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the rage cost of your Sunder Armor and Devastate abilities by [@value].

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Disciplines
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Shield Wall, Retaliation and Recklessness abilities by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Concussion Blow
TalentsTiers.Description:
15 Rage
Melee Range

Instant
30 sec cooldown

Stuns the opponent for 5 sec and deals 426 damage (based on attack power).

TalentsTiers.Name: Gag Order
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Shield Bash and Heroic Throw abilities a [@value]% chance to silence the target for 3 sec and increases the damage of your Shield Slam ability by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases physical damage you deal when a one-handed melee weapon is equipped by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Defensive Stance
TalentsTiers.Description: While in Defensive Stance all spell damage is reduced by [@value]% and when you Block, Parry or Dodge an attack you have a [@value2]% chance to become Enraged, increasing melee damage caused by [@value3]% for 12 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Vigilance
TalentsTiers.Description:
30 yd
Instant
Focus your protective gaze on a group or raid target, reducing their damage taken by 3% and transfers 10% of the threat they cause to you. In addition, each time they are hit by an attack your Taunt cooldown is refreshed. Lasts 30 min. This effect can only be on one target at a time.

TalentsTiers.Name: Focused Rage
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the rage cost of your offensive abilities by [@value].

TalentsTiers.Name: Vitality
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Strength and Stamina by [@value]% and your Expertise by [@value2].

TalentsTiers.Name: Safeguard
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces damage taken by the target of your Intervene ability by [@value]% for 6 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Warbringer
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Charge, Intercept and Intervene abilities are now usable while in combat, while shapeshifted  and no longer have a stance requirement, but the cooldown on Charge is increased by 5 sec. In addition, your Intervene ability will remove all movement impairing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Devastate
TalentsTiers.Description:
15 Rage
Melee Range

Instant
Requires Shield
Requires Defensive Stance
Sunder the target's armor causing the Sunder Armor effect. In addition, causes 120% of weapon damage plus 101 for each application of Sunder Armor on the target. The Sunder Armor effect can stack up to 5 times.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Critical Block
TalentsTiers.Description: Your successful blocks have a [@value]% chance to block double the normal amount and increases your chance to criticially hit with your Shield Slam ability by an additional [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sword and Board
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Devastate ability by [@value]% and when your Devastate or Revenge ability deals damage it has a [@value2]% chance of refreshing the cooldown of your Shield Slam ability and reducing its cost by 100% for 5 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Damage Shield
TalentsTiers.Description: Whenever you take damage from or block a melee attack you cause damage equal to [@value]% of your block value.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shockwave
TalentsTiers.Description:
15 Rage
Melee Range

Instant
20 sec cooldown

Sends a wave of force in front of the warrior, causing 449 damage (based on attack power) and stunning all enemy targets within 10 yards in a frontal cone for 4 sec.
